expo.name: Influencemenow
expo.description:
2.0.0Alpha 13/05/2019

What has been done in this version?
- The registration system has been restructured.
- The forms system has been restricted.
- The appearance of some components have been changed.
- The system of schemes in the backend has been restructured.

2.1.1Alpha 14/05/2019

What has been done in this version?
- The login system has been included.
- Performance improvement has been made.

2.1.2Alpha 15/05/2019

What has been done in this version?
- Bugs fixed

2.2.2Alpha 20/05/2019

What has been done in this version?
- The user can use avatars
- Bugs fixed

2.2.3Alpha 20/05/2019

What has been done in this version?
- Bugs fixed
- Avatar with capital letters

2.2.4Alpha 27/05/2019

What has been done in this version?
- Bugs fixed

2.3.2Alpha 27/05/2019

What has been done in this version?
- Bugs fixed
- Form of "Submit a prize" reformed.

2.4.3Alpha 10/06/2019

What has been done in this version?
- Bugs fixed
- The "Prizes" section has been created.
- Imagen can be change 'Prizes'

2.5.4Alpha 14/06/2019

What has been done in this version?
- Bugs fixed
- The "Create a contest" remoformated.

2.6.4Alpha 14/06/2019

What has been done in this version?
- Bugs fixed
- The "Create a contest/Submit a Prize" remoformated.
